Japanbuilder,"2016-01-24T07:37:51.693Z","A Simple but Fun little set","

As a parent of two small children the simplicity of this set attracted me to purchase it. My children have been having a lot of fun with the motorcycle and enjoy playing pretend hide and seek with the crook and his wall.
Nothing fancy a little booklet explains the very simple build for the figures, the background element and the motorcycle.
38 parts all of them fairly common it seems. Though I had not touched a Lego in years until I got this little set I was amazed by the actual "
column3: texture pieces and the crowbar. Those were new for me.&nbsp

column1: 2 very nice figures are included. I particularly like the patrol officer with this silver shades. The crook looks grizzled and his facial expression makes him seem like he might even be the leader of a tough bunch of Lego crooks. Very nice prints on both of them.
Very simple to build with less than 40 parts. But it took my little ones a bit to plow through it. But they figured it out. It was fun to watch them put it together.
The bike looks sleek! I am tempted to get another if only so that the play value increases because the crook being on foot makes for very short chases.
It is a nice set for kids who might be getting into the bigger police sets and such. This will increase your population and give you a nice piece of police hardware to boot. Not bad for the price.
